messages.title: Fairness
messages.content: I listen to all of the politicians talking at the moment, and very few seem to be talking about what matters to me – fairness.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: From what I've seen in the papers and online, there's only one party that I can trust to fight for our NHS and put equality at the heart of everything our government does. That's the Liberal Democrats.

issues.economy: They are the only party that have economic recovery stays on track. However, unlike the Tories they know when to stop cutting and their plans involve £50 billion less in cuts.
issues.education: I've been impressed by how they have stood up to the Conservatives' extreme plans in government over the last few years – stopping them running schools for profit, stopping them allowing bosses to sack workers for no reason and stopping them from allowing the security services to read our emails.
issues.health: From what I've seen in the papers and online, there's only one party that I can trust to fight for our NHS and put equality at the heart of everything our government does. That's the Liberal Democrats.

leaflet.personalStatement: I want to support a party that will put equality at the heart of everything it does.

quotes.text: Only the Liberal Democrats stood up for what was right then, and from what I've seen they are the only people who share my priorities now.

images.caption: Hannah Thompson, 22 year old Online Rights Activist

leaflet.additionalNotes: As for Labour, I lost faith in them when they dragged us into an illegal war in Iraq that cost the lives of countless innocent Iraqis and hundreds of British soldiers.
